HiiHAT

Developer Documentation for HiiHAT IDL functions.

Overview Directory File Source Etc Categories Search Index Warnings Help Developer documentation

Directory: metric_learning/

.pro files

hiihat_apply_metric.pro

Given an image and a precomputed LDA matrix transforms the image.

hiihat_learn_metric.pro

Given an image and a set of ROIs defining a set of classes, transforms the image via LDA.

hiihat_mdmc_lda.pro

Calculate a LDA-based transform for multi-class/multi-domain input data.

hiihat_mdmc_xvalidate.pro

Wrapper to learn optimal regularization parameter lambda \in [0,1] for LDA via cross validation.
